messages.message:
I noticed that not everyone is using the same poetry version. The version everyone should use is 1.4.1.
This can lead to large diffs generated for .lock and requirements files.
```# check version
poetry --version

# if not 1.4.1
curl -sSL https://install.python-poetry.org | python3 - --uninstall
curl -sSL https://install.python-poetry.org | python3 - --version 1.4.1```
`poetry self update 1.4.1` also worked for me
